mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list (v_id, sale_no, regdate, state) VALUES (#{v_id}, #{sale_no}, CURDATE(), '미입금')
mapper.select: SELECT o.or_no, o.v_id as "UID", o.sale_no ,s.title, s.attachment, s.price, date_format(regdate,"%Y %c/%e") as "REGDATE", o.state, u.v_email, u.v_name FROM userinfo u, order_list o, sale s WHERE o.v_id = u.v_id AND o.sale_no = s.no AND o.v_id = #{v_id} ORDER BY o.or_no DESC
